title: My mom got the job!!!
body:
So, long story short, my mom was the house typey mom who takes care of her lil cubs. My mom has been taking care of me (Whether it's Dr.'s appointments, going to the store for me, driving me around, etc etc etc) for about 8 months now (Car accidents OP) 

AND after telling her nonstop to apply for jobs, she had been.

For 3+ months, and she was starting to lose hope. Last week she had a job interview for a school district (She works with special needs kids). They never called her back Friday (They told her they would.) 

AND IN THE MIDDLE OF MY RANKED MATCH!!!! My mom sent me a text "I got the job" She was super excited! I was super ecstatic for her (We won the ranked match, so that was a double whoop)

I just wanted to share the good news, I'm happy for my mum.

#ShareThePositive
